  • java.lang.Object
    • sholl.Options
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ij.plugin.PlugIn
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class Options
extends java.lang.Object
implements ij.plugin.PlugIn
    Implements the "Sholl Options and Metrics" command.
    Author:
    Tiago Ferreira

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String arg)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is called when the plugin is loaded. arg can be specified in plugins.config.
        Specified by:
        run in interface ij.plugin.PlugIn
        Parameters:
        arg - If RESET_OPTIONS_LABEL options and preferences are reset to defaults. If SKIP_BITMAP_OPTIONS_LABEL options specific to bitmap analysis are not displayed in GUI when displaying prompt.

      • setPlotOutput

        public void setPlotOutput(int output)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the flag for output plots.
        Parameters:
        output - the output flag. Either Options.ALL_PLOTS, Options.ONLY_LINEAR_PLOT or Options.NO_PLOTS

      • setNoPlots

        @Deprecated
public void setNoPlots(boolean noPlots)
        Deprecated. 
        Instructs Sholl_Analysis to exclude plots from output (only tables will be displayed).
        Parameters:
        noPlots - If true, plugin will only output tables. If false, both tables and plots will be produced (the default)

      • setMetric

        public void setMetric(int key,
                      boolean value)
        Deprecated. 

      • setPromptChoice

        public void setPromptChoice(int key,
                            boolean value)
        Deprecated. 

      • setNoTable

        @Deprecated
public void setNoTable(boolean noTable)
        Deprecated. 
        Instructs Sholl_Analysis to exclude detailed table from output (Summary table is still displayed).
        Parameters:
        noTable - If true, plugin will not output the "detailed table" containing all the retrieved profiles. Note that the Summary "Sholl Results" table is always displayed.
        See Also:
        setNoPlots(boolean)

      • setSkipBitmapOptions

        public void setSkipBitmapOptions(boolean skipBitmapOptions)
        Deprecated.
